newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philippine oil well continues to yield oil shows.
newsitem.headline: Philippine oil well continues to yield oil shows.

text.p: Philippine National Oil Co-Exploration Corp continue to record oil shows at its third well in Maniguin in the central Philippines.
"Poor oil shows were recorded while drilling. The PNOC-EC drilled to a measured depth of 4,876 feet," Griselda Bausa, Department of Energy director, said in a drilling advisory.
Last weekend, "rare to weak" oil shows were detected at 4,414 feet.

Other companies with stakes in the Maniguin consortium are Oriental Petroleum & Minerals, Petrofields Exploration and Development Co Inc, Asia Petroleum Corp, Basic Petroleum & Minerals Inc, United Kingdon-based Dragon Far East Ltd and local firm Southwest Resources.
The consortium expects to flow more than 180 barrels of oil per day at this Maniguin well.
